job_tasks.phrase: Continually experimenting with and integrating the latest generative AI tech to pioneer novel educational experiences
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to experimenting with and integrating generative AI technologies, which falls under the core definition of developing and adapting AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: envision, code, and ship sophisticated full-stack applications and interactive AI tools
job_tasks.justification: The act of coding and shipping full-stack applications and tools is a clear indicator of software development responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly weave AI magic across front-end interfaces, back-end algorithms, and end-to-end product experiences
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the integration of AI into various layers of software development, from user interfaces to backend logic.

job_tasks.phrase: Own and optimize the entire product lifecycle
job_tasks.justification: Owning the product lifecycle from conception to enhancement is a broad software development responsibility.
Gathering requirements is a fundamental step in understanding business needs and translating them into technical specifications.

job_tasks.phrase: Partnering with stakeholders to align development with learner needs
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a need to understand business context and stakeholder requirements to guide development.

job_tasks.phrase: Leveraging AI-driven automation across testing, debugging and beyond to maximize development velocity and robustness
job_tasks.justification: The use of AI for automation in testing and debugging points towards MLOps practices for efficient software delivery.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications
job_tasks.justification: Developing and delivering applications, even with an AI focus, falls under the umbrella of software development.
While broad, 'implementing AI' in the context of developing applications suggests hands-on work with AI models.

soft_skills.phrase: Own and optimize the entire product lifecycle
Continually experimenting with and integrating the latest generative AI tech

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes designing, developing, and deploying full-stack applications powered by generative AI. Phrases like 'generative AI tech,' 'full-stack applications and interactive AI tools,' and 'weave AI magic across front-end interfaces, back-end algorithms, and end-to-end product experiences' strongly align with the definition of a GenAI Engineer.
